arts.ttl: Aston Villa see off Bournemouth in impressive win
arts.sum: Aston Villa put in a dominant team performance, with four different goalscorers, to secure their biggest Premier League win of the season by beating Bournemouth 4-0 at Villa Park.

arts.ttl: View: Bournemouth made pre-match mistake at Villa Park, it helped Aston Villa to victory
arts.sum: Aston Villa secured a huge 4-0 victory over Bournemouth on Sunday. Bournemouth fell to a heavy defeat against Villa as their hopes of returning to... The post View: Bournemouth made pre-match mistake at Villa Park, it helped Aston Villa to victory appeared first on Villa News.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa’s turnaround delights Unai Emery as Bournemouth are blown away
arts.sum: Villa failed to score in their first four league games this season but managed four in one afternoon to leapfrog the Cherries on goal difference.

arts.ttl: Villa hit four past Bournemouth to move up to seventh
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League clash between Aston Villa and Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: Villa find scoring boots to rout Bournemouth after penalty let-off
arts.sum: Aston Villa increased their goal tally for the season to 13 as they finally found their shooting boots to thrash Bournemouth 4-0 at Villa Park and leapfrog their visitors into seventh place in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa, Bournemouth starting lineups confirmed! Has Emery recalled Watkins despite poor form?
arts.sum: Aston Villa and Bournemouth announce their starting lineups for Sunday's Premier League fixture in the West Midlands.
